name: Chicken Hero in Wulin
description:
What would it be like to regenerate a chicken in the familiar world of martial arts?
As a chicken, can it change its life to create miracles? Become an unprecedented and fantastic Great Xia?
Everything is about to start!
(Welcome to join the QQ exchange group and make valuable suggestions: 415688797)
======Content introduction======
[A world of free exploration]
Interactive menu: There are many passers-by NPC in the game to communicate with them, cultivate goodwill, improve reputation, and even learn something and harvest props.
*For details, see the game's《处世宝典》


The weather is changeable: Different monsters and events will appear at night.

In addition, there are some special labyrinths in the game, which can be explored and excavated. (Introduction at the end of the article)

[Martial arts magic skills and props]
martial (武术)

Exercises (功法)

Props (道具): You can try the explosive power of drunkenness, try to poison your opponent... It can be a chicken that has always been upright, or it can be used to control violence.


[Free role growth]
Through different game mechanisms such as foraging, buying human delicacies and trading commodities, the growth of numerical attributes can be achieved.


[Mechanism of reincarnation]
After each defeat, they have the opportunity to rebirth from nirvana and gain different talents. Maybe the last round was still a weak chicken, so this one has the ability to go against the sky.



[Centralized market economy]
The market not only gathers a variety of vendors, but also can conduct material transactions to control the changing price index.

Rich props setting and application


[Task guidance and achievement list]
In the game, there are not only the branch tasks outside the main line, but also the role tasks of each special character, and even long-term tasks to repeatedly obtain benefits.

You can also gain different achievements and titles to increase your ability.
